description:
As a blood bank user
  I want to add patients requiring blood transfusion
  So that I can manage blood requests and track patient requirements

elements.name: Blood bank successfully adds a new patient with all valid details

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see a success message indicating patient was added
the patient should appear in the patients list
the form should be cleared

elements.name: Blood bank adds patient with different blood group

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see a success message indicating patient was added
the patient should appear in the patients list

elements.name: Blood bank attempts to add patient with missing required fields

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I leave all patient form fields empty
I submit the patient form
I should see validation error messages
the form should not be submitted
I should remain on the dashboard

elements.name: Blood bank attempts to add patient with invalid phone number

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see an error message about invalid phone number format
the form should not be submitted

elements.name: Blood bank attempts to add patient with zero units

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see an error message about minimum units requirement
the form should not be submitted

elements.name: Blood bank attempts to add patient with duplicate MRID

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
a patient with MRID "MR2024005" already exists
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see an error message about duplicate MRID
the form should not be submitted

elements.name: Blood bank verifies patient form fields are present

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I should see the following form fields:
all required fields should be marked as mandatory
I should see a submit button for adding patient

elements.name: Blood bank adds multiple patients in sequence

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I add a patient with name "Ananya Singh" and MRID "MR2024006"
I should see a success message
I add another patient with name "Vikram Malhotra" and MRID "MR2024007"
I should see a success message
both patients should appear in the patients list

elements.name: Blood bank verifies form clears after successful submission

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select a future date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see a success message
the form fields should be cleared

elements.name: Blood bank adds patient with urgent requirement (today's date)

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
I navigate to the patients tab
I fill in the patient form with:
I select today's date for blood requirement
I submit the patient form
I should see a success message indicating patient was added
the patient should appear in the patients list

name: Blood Bank Add Patient
